description.S1: Jameson is pissed off but otherwise fine.
description.S2: Head back to Roseway to give Anton the good news.

blurb.B1: Return to Anton and talk to him to gain Auntie Cleo Reputation, 1000 Bit Cartridge and 11,000xp.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, it's you.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: As if my thoughts weren't dark enough already. What is it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found your associate Jameson. He's safe.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I have unfortunate news, your associate, Jameson, is dead.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I suppose I'll be going. Goodbye.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: That is wonderful news, I'd feared the worst.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Jameson. I didn't do right by him, did I? Only cared about how he helped or hurt my research.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's good to hear your employees actually mean more to you than your research.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You really didn't care about him at all, though, did you? It's all about your ambition.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You know, there's more to care about than black marks and paperwork.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Of course they do. Please don't mistake my ambition for callousness.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What should I mistake it for, compassion?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You must see how one could do exactly that, can't you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I stand corrected. I'll be off now.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: If my colleagues refuse to take their lives seriously, why should I? All they do is complain. They refuse to see the opportunity afforded us here.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Just wanted to hear you admit that you're a heartless bastard. Thanks.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You can see why people might think you're callous, though, can't you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You make a good point. Good day to you, sir.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Believe what you will, but I'm not the manipulative, ego driven person you think me to be. I'm not.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I guess I'll just have to take your word for it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You just keep telling yourself that.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: I understand I can come off as manipulative and ego driven. It's something I've always been forced to contend with.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: It's just that their constant complaining can begin to wear. They refuse to see the opportunity afforded us here. It's infuriating.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You really are an insufferable jackass.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: You understand nothing. Me least of all.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I suppose it's none of my business. Goodbye.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Not in this colony, there isn't. But success here will get me to Byzantium. I'll have recognition, money, proper facilities. It's the only place to lead a life of meaning in this system.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's not really for me to say, Anton. I'll be off now.
